name: Three Dimensions: The Spin Off
description: A fun little platformer game about exploring other dimensions. Every dimension has its own new mechanic and everything is pretty simplistic. TD: The Spin Off is a spin off  of  a game called Three Dimension that was made for the Mix and Game Jam. This game was entirely made by Stu, if you found any bugs or just want to send feedback (that would really help :) ) post a comment.
